name: Cataplorers
description:
Link to GameJolt : https://gamejolt.com/games/Cataplorers/587837
Recommended to check out!

This will be a 2D Topdown Puzzle/shooter game. The game is being produced by 6 Students as a game project. We will work on the game for 3 delayed weeks and then will have a finished first product. Some including tags to the game would be: #horror #action #strategy #Puzzle #Shooter #2DPixelGraphics

So regarding the gameplay coming. The game will be based on two characters exploring a Catacomb. See it all linking up? Catacomb - Explorers :D Very creative, we know! So In the game you will play as two diffrent characters dedicated for two different things. (Combat & Puzzles) In the game you will have to base your gameplay out of two factors such as (health & sanity) Both characters will have some amount of health but the puzzle solving character will be given sanity due to being afraid of the dark. Skeletons will be haunting the dark and eerie catacomb and you better be prepared and plan your gameplay!

Game credits:
Game director: ZlashY
Lead Programmer: Allyen
Lead Artist (The Only Artist): ZlashY
Programmers: ZultooX, Campino945, Viking and Filip.
Graphical helpers: Filip ZultooX.
